DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample tumor tissue patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This research study study biomarkers tissue sample patient ductal breast carcinoma situ .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Tissue Samples From Patients With Ductal Breast Carcinoma Situ
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To validate prognostic utility Oncotype DX Recurrence Score® assay tissue sample patient ductal breast carcinoma situ enrol clinical trial ECOG-E5194 . OUTLINE : RNA extract archived tissue sample analyze gene expression profile Oncotype DX Recurrence Score® assay ( reverse transcriptase-PCR-based assay ) .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis ductal breast carcinoma situ Enrolled clinical trial ECOGE5194 Local surgery without radiotherapy Treated treat tamoxifen Available tissue sample Hormone receptor status specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Menopausal status specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
